name: Global Anti-Counterfeiting Group
goal: To co-ordinate the international activities of national and regional IPR enforcement associations. International research and public awareness campaigns on IPR enforcment. The development of IPR enforcement in the emerging economies.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: The main EU files followed are:  IPR Enforcement; Customs; Trade and Home Affairs
